title: Dominion Azir
body: Recently I played a game against an Azir {{champion:268}}  in dominion. Before we were let out of base, he had used his abilities to hop over the wall and claim one of the turrets. Since they had a lead, they could afford to keep 2 players bottom the whole game. Ultimately, the enemy team won. Pretty unfair exploit, I'd think.

replies.body: Yeah, that's very much a bug and an unfair experience. We've got a fix for that in testing at the moment, if it goes well that should be fixed in the next patch. If not, definitely the patch after.
Why is he not disabled in dominion? He ruins the game and was the sole reason we lost by 70 points!

> Why is he not disabled in dominion? He ruins the game and was the sole reason we lost by 70 points!

because hes not {{champion:134}}

> Wow, Riot cares about Dominion!

{{champion:34}} So young, so naive

They care about bugs. There's a difference.
(j/k)

> Wow, Riot cares about Dominion!

HAHAHA This is a bug they've known about for THREE patches, let's be serious here.

> Yeah, that's very much a bug and an unfair experience. We've got a fix for that in testing at the moment, if it goes well that should be fixed in the next patch. If not, definitely the patch after.

Gonna take one or two patches of a game breaking bug haha, no wonder tt/cs is still full of bots and bugs , i wonder if you would take that long to fix a gamebreaking SR bug.
im gonna point out that there is a gamebreaking bug of abilities not working as some champs and not a thing is being done so yes.
Why does it take this long though? The bug has been reported like 2 months ago when Azir was on PBE.
